belongs_to_collection.name: The Indian Tomb (Richard Eichberg-Film GmbH) Collection

overview: After the events of Der Tiger von Eschnapur, Maharadscha Chandra is ready to execute his well-planned vengeance, in which German architect Peter Fürbringer, his fiancée Irene and his assistant will have to fight for their lives amidst a revolt fueled by traitor Prinz Ramigani.
title: The Indian Tomb
